front.title: OWAMP and TWAMP Well-Known Port Assignments

abstract.t: This memo explains the motivation and describes the re-assignment of well-known ports for the OWAMP and TWAMP protocols for control and measurement, and clarifies the meaning and composition of these standards track protocol names for the industry. The memo updates RFC 4656 and RFC 5357, in terms of the UDP well- known port assignments, and clarifies the complete OWAMP and TWAMP protocol composition for the industry.
